verses.verse: And it came to <S%H6256>pass<s%>, that after the <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8666>expired<s%>, at the <S%H6256>time<s%> that <S%H4428>kings<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3097>battle<s%>, Joab led <S%H5090>forth<s%> the <S%H2428>power<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%>, and <S%H7843>wasted<s%> the <S%H776>country<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>. But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%>, and destroyed <S%H2040>it<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%> of their <S%H4428>king<s%> from off his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> it to <S%H4948>weigh<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and there were <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H1732>it<s%>; and it was set upon David's <S%H7218>head<s%>: and he <S%H3318>brought<s%> also <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And he brought <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were in <S%H7787>it<s%>, and cut them with <S%H4050>saws<s%>, and with <S%H2757>harrows<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with <S%H4050>axes<s%>. Even so <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And it came to pass after <S%H310>this<s%>, that there <S%H5975>arose<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; at which <S%H227>time<s%> <S%H5444>Sibbechai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H5598>Sippai<s%>, that was of the <S%H3211>children<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>: and they were <S%H3665>subdued<s%>.

And there was <S%H4421>war<s%> again with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>; and <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3265>Jair<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H3902>Lahmi<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite<s%>, whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H6086>staff<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver<s%>'s <S%H4500>beam<s%>.

And yet again there was <S%H4421>war<s%> at <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, where was a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4060>stature<s%>, whose <S%H676>fingers<s%> and <S%H676>toes<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> on each <S%H8337>hand<s%>, and six on each <S%H3205>foot<s%>: and he also was the son of the <S%H7497>giant<s%>.
But when he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%> slew <S%H5221>him<s%>.

<S%H411>These<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>; and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
